title: Circadian Rhythm Sleep-Wake Disorders
description: A comprehensive guide to Circadian Rhythm Sleep-Wake Disorders, including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Circadian Rhythm Sleep-Wake Disorders is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Sleep-Wake Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
